should be insane .. just spotted the typo in
torrent and folder name..

lol,dude,you should change your name to "King Typo" or maybe "Lord Sleepy Eyes".just kidding.this really isn't my thing but ima dl anyway & re-seed to help you with that by-the-gig interweb you have to deal with down there.I am very happy we have unlimited net here in the US....too bad our gov keeps trying to tell us (& the rest of the world for that matter) how we can or can't use it

my eyes are bad.. i having injections in them
to clear up a inflammation which they arent sure
whats causing it.. just imagine you have cobwebs in the eyes thats what I have currently.. I just got with of the foggiest..

plus on top I have kidney infection over the weekend

I really hate the small font here.. only way is to force font scaling on browser which does everything which means more scrolling about

recently got rid of the fogginess I mean

its scarey when you loosing your sight..

but then being up to 4am ripping dont help

I would correct the typos but TPB wont allow editing on comments alone the torrent info

delete torrent is offline too
that sucks dude.my best wishes on a speedy recovery man.I have bad eyes also but nothing on that level
